summary: After a system reset, Mike requested to re-run sprint SP-001. The Sprint Planning Architect confirmed the sprint's user stories (US-001, US-010, US-015), updated their status to 'In Sprint', saved the sprint plan, and asked for confirmation to begin execution.

decisions.title: Re-run Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Proceed with re-execution of sprint including US-001 (Employee Directory Search), US-010 (Mock Login Page), and US-015 (Add Employee Profile) after reset.

actions.task: Confirm readiness to start execution on SP-001

backlog_deltas.title: Marked as In Sprint for re-execution
Marked as In Sprint for re-execution
